mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoOrgztOrdAffInqAtchmnfl Generator(Generator) 2018-06-11 */ ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_SN , ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCHMNFL_TUR , ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCH_FILE_NM , ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCH_FILE_UR , ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCH_FILE_CP , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCHMNFL WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_SN = #{orgztOrdAffInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_ATCHMNFL_TUR = #{orgztOrdAffInqAtchmnflTur,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
